title: Foxworth Friday: McVay vs Shanahan, Can We Trust the Nets?, Cleanliness Etiquette
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the difference in the coaching between McVay and Shanahan, breakdown some of the biggest stories around the NFL at the quarter-way mark, what to expect from the Nets, and discuss how sometimes personal hygiene becomes everyone's problem.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
